issue.title: [CF 177] Alpha config when conditions fail
issue.body:
Request for alpha slider at condition fail -- opening ticket In response to your comment:

"Icons always set their alpha to 0 when conditions fail. Open a ticket with this if you would like me to make it customizable so that I won't forget about it."

Awesome mod.  Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user Mantooth555 | Imported from CurseForge issue #177 | Raw
